ja528:5.5: Taramānarūpohāsi → ... rūpo gaṇhāsi (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja528:18.3: Paricārakānaṃ sataṃ → paricārakānaṃ sattānaṃ (bj) | paricārikānaṃ sattānaṃ (s2, s3) | parivārakānaṃ sattānaṃ (pts1)
ja528:19.4: Mayhaṃ vā → amhaṃ vā (bj) | mayha vā (s2, s3) | mayhañca (pts1)
ja528:33.5: puttadāre ca → putte ca dāre ca (pts1)
ja528:40.4: Utrāsayitvā → citrā sayitvā (bj, pts1) | hantvā sayitvā (s2, s3)
ja528:43.2: ahetuñca pavadanti → hetuñca apavadanti (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja528:52.3: sace → ceva (bj) | cepi (s2, s3, pts1, mr)
ja528:60.2: saññate → saṃyame (bj, s2, s3, mr), brahmacārino → brahmacāriye (s2, s3) | brahmacārayo (pts1) | brahmacāriyo (c1)
